  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120309</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120309</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Analiziraj sistem  dveh drogov, spojenih s tečajem</string>
            <string language="en">Analyze a system of two rods, each attached to hinges</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Analysieren Sie ein System von zwei Stangen, jedes
angebracht zu den Scharnieren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Analysez un système de deux tiges, chacun fixées
aux charnières</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Analise um sistema de duas hastes, cada um unidas 
às dobradiças</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Analizzi un sistema di due coni retinici, ciascuno
fissati alle cerniere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναλύστε ένα σύστημα δύο ράβδων, κάθε ένα που 
συνδέεται με τις αρθρώσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Analice un sistema de dos barras, cada uno 
asociadas a las bisagras</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Dva enakomerna droga visita (s pomočjo tečajev) na zidu in sta pritrjena skupaj.</string>
            <string language="en">Two uniform rods are hung (with the use of hinges) on a wall and attached to each other.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ravnovesje</string>
            <string language="en">equilibrium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">statika</string>
            <string language="en">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwei konstante Stangen werden (mit dem Gebrauch 
der Scharniere) an eine Wand gehangen und angebracht miteinander.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deux tiges uniformes sont arrêtées (avec 
l'utilisation des charnières) sur un mur et entre eux jointes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Duas hastes uniformes são penduradas (com o uso 
das dobradiças) em uma parede e unidas a se.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Due coni retinici dell'uniforme sono appesi 
(con l'uso delle cerniere) su una parete e sono fissati l'un l'altro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύο ομοιόμορφες ράβδοι κρεμιούνται (με τη χρήση των 
αρθρώσεων) σε έναν τοίχο και συνδέονται η μια με την άλλη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dos barras uniformes se cuelgan (con el uso de 
bisagras) en una pared y se asocian el uno al otro.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichgewicht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">équilibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">equilíbrio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">equilibrio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ισορροπία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στατική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">equilibrio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">statics</string>
          </keyword>
